topic.title: Getting Started with Monitoring
topic.abstract: Operating your Monitoring service.You can use the Monitoring service to monitor the health of your cloud and, if needed, to troubleshoot issues. This service leverages Monasca, a multi-tenant, scalable, fault-tolerant OpenStack monitoring service.

body.p: Monasca data can be extracted and used for a variety of legitimate purposes, and different purposes require different forms of data sanitization or encoding to protect against invalid or malicious data. Any data pulled from Monasca should be considered untrusted data, so users are advised to apply appropriate encoding and/or sanitization techniques to ensure safe and correct usage and display of data in a web browser, database scan, or any other use of the data.
